mapper.select:
select a.* from pub_sms_channel a
AND a.sms_channel_code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{smsChannelCode},'%')
AND a.sms_channel_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{smsChannelName},'%')
AND a.sms_userful_code = #{smsUserfulCode}
AND a.is_delete=0
ORDER BY a.add_time desc
LIMIT #{offset}, #{pagesize}
select a.* from pub_sms_channel a where a.sms_channel_code = #{smsChannelCode} and a.platform = #{platform}
SELECT a.sms_userful_code as userfulCode,a.sms_userful_name as userfulName FROM pub_sms_channel a WHERE a.is_delete = 0 GROUP BY a.sms_userful_code
select a.* from pub_sms_channel a where a.sms_userful_code = #{smsUserfulCode} and a.platform = #{platform} and a.status = #{status} and a.is_delete = 0
